column5: Looking for info from anyone thats fished the Slate islands  Are there still 3 camps that can be used on a 1st come bases ?????  Thank you

Had a friend who made the trip 3 summers ago and the cabins were still there. There's gotta be someone in Terrace Bay who knows for sure though. Have a great trip if you go, that's one I've wanted to do myself for years.
